TopicTitle: Bug: Ultimate Kerbin 3 Challenge does not finish

Articles.Content:
KSP Version: v1.0.5 (just updated) on Windows 10

What Happens: After doing the Ultimate Kerbin 3 Challenge and coming back the Contract does not complete.

Maybe I'm getting things wrong, but "be ready to launch your vessel from Kerbin" should mean having a fully functional vessel (Energy, Control, Fuel Tank and Engine) back at KSC for refueling. Except for, again lossing a wing part (-.-), the plane is in perfect shape.

Steps to Replicate:

1) Accept Contact (in version 1.0.5)

2) Launch Spaceplane.

3) Fly by mun.

4) Fly by Minimus.

5) Land at KSC.

Save file and output_log:

Load the quicksave, but the log may not be of any use since some time passed after the event. Download Link

Fixes/Workarounds:

Thanks sal_avager I got pointed to the debug panel to complete the contract.

Edited November 10, 2015 by Artimus

Hi Artimus, did you accept this challenge in 1.0.4 and complete it in 1.0.5 ?

If so, please see here for information.

Otherwise please see here.

The contract was brand new. I've never seen such a contract before upgrading to 1.0.5

Thanks for the debug panel hint, I've never come across it.

Edited November 10, 2015 by Artimus
Please see here Artimus, and upload to a file site the save and the output_log.txt from just after this occurs.
I've added the download link to the bug report, I hope that'll help.

You accepted the contract after updating, but it likely generated prior to the update. We have had some issues with saved vessel situations being modified. The final situation it is asking you to do there is not to land. It's asking you to get into a prelaunch situation, which isn't possible. The original contract was probably asking you to end on a suborbital trajectory of Kerbin.

For now, hit alt-f12, go to contracts, and hit "Com" beside the contract to forcibly complete it.
